attributes.action: grant all uk workers a 6 month tax free period
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by granting every worker a 6 month tax free period it would be more likely to stimulate our ailing economy as well as allowing the working people to enjoy the fruits of their labour. so instead of giving more money to banks and such like give something to the hard working people of this country for a change
